(:action place ; Place an item into a container and update inventory status
  :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?container - object)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (inventory ?agent ?container) (airtight ?container))
  :effect (and (in ?item ?container) (not (inventory ?agent ?item))

(:action separate ; Separate items using a specified medium
  :parameters (?entity - agent ?item - object ?medium - material)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?entity ?medium) (contains ?container ?item) (or (type ?medium type1) (type ?medium type2) (type ?medium type3)))
  :effect (separated ?item ?medium)
)
